markdownRemark.html:
This week has been a roller-coaster. I try endlessly to get paid for my experience and knowledge, reaching out to unknown people I think can help me.

Sometimes I really think this it is, now I will be able to help customer, providing value, find nice team members to collaborate with on a daily basis, learn more, share more, implement valuable features, etc and then with some, I just feel I loose hope of the human being, ha ha, did he play some games?, did they even listen to what I said?, why did they not see what I know?

The god thing is tough, I've now even more convinced I'm on the right path, I know that what some people sees as a weakness is really a strength because I know what it is about, they do not, and I hope they never needs to experience it themselves.

The difficult part is to let it go, and I'm getting much better at it. That's why I know it will work out fine in the end.

I just need to find the right people.
